      Methods in application that return Scene 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scene SceneLoader.load(java.lang.String path)
      Read the scene specified by path, relative to the project scene folder, ~/scenes
      Methods in application with parameters of type Scene 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SceneLoader.save(Scene scene, java.lang.String name)
      Save the scene as the specifed name
      Director Director.setScene(Scene scene)
      Set the current scene to scene, with an empty prompt message.
      Director Director.setScene(java.lang.String message, Scene scene)
      Set the current scene to scene, with an prompt message printed tp the console.
